txt.en:
You do not know me, but I am a friend. I have sent you this message at the request of Lord Elrond of Imladris; he asks that you come to the Last Homely House at once!

Please hurry! I will meet you by the steps just outside the House, in the Vale of Imladris. I regret I cannot tell you more, but the roads are watched always, and Lord Elrond wishes to keep his secrets. Please do hurry!

Pethelen, Elf of Imladris
